summary: This is an email chain from July 2023 between FBI personnel discussing a recently identified victim connected to the Epstein/Maxwell case. The victim has identified other potential traffickers, prompting the FBI to consider due diligence on the information.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.role: Subject of a prior DANY (District Attorney New York) call/memo
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject line of the email chain as the topic of a prior memo from the District Attorney's office.

events.title: FBI Email about New Victim Information
events.description: An FBI agent emails a colleague to discuss a victim who recently came to their attention with connections to the Epstein/Maxwell case, and who has identified other potential traffickers.

events.title: Follow-up Response to Victim Discussion
events.description: A follow-up email is sent apologizing for a delay and offering to schedule a call to discuss the victim information mentioned on June 30.

keyFacts: A new victim with connections to the Epstein/Maxwell case was recently identified by the FBI in mid-2023.
This victim has identified other potential traffickers beyond Epstein and Maxwell.
The FBI is considering conducting due diligence on this information before deciding on any further action.
The communication references a prior memo concerning Leon Black from the District Attorney's office.
